866360.name: Fantasy Grounds - Hellfrost: The Frost Giant's Hold (Savage Worlds)
866360.description:
Hellfrost: The Frost Giant's Hold

The End Is Nigh!
Three times the heroes have interfered in the plans of Jarl Hrimwulf the Grim, and three times the heroes have vanquished the jarls minions. But now the Norns have decreed the fifi nal act must be played out between the mighty frost giant and the mortal adventures.
At stake is nothing less that the fate of the Hearthlands. After facing death on the shores of White Lake battle must be taken to The Frost Giants Hold!
The Frost Giants Hold is the last installment of a four-part series, but can be played as a standalone adventure.
The Frost Giants Hold is part four of the Saga of the Frost Giants for the epic fantasy world of Hellfrost for the award-winning Savage Worlds RPG.
This product includes:
  • 29 Action packed encounters
  • 6 Maps
  • 24 NPCs and creatures
  • 64 Story entries to help describe the action.
Requires the Hellfrost Players Guide
Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Kevin Doswell
Requirements: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Kevin Doswell
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
